=======
CHANGES
=======

0.2.1 (2011-12-28)
==================

Features
--------

- Added python2.6 support.

- Added a ``ptah-manage`` script. It is documented
  in the "Command-Line utilities" chapter.


Bug Fixes
---------

- Fixed mail template generation on python3


0.2 (2011-12-21)
================

- require pyramid 1.3


0.1.1 (2011-12-05)
==================

- Fix rst renderer


0.1 (2011-11-19)
================

- Initial release
